SecurePreferences - Class in de.adorsys.android.securestoragelibrary
Handles every use case for the developer using Secure Storage.
SecureStorageException - Exception in de.adorsys.android.securestoragelibrary
Useful for catching possible exceptions thrown internally in the library so the user knows what to expect
SecureStorageException(String, Throwable, SecureStorageException.ExceptionType) - Constructor for exception de.adorsys.android.securestoragelibrary.SecureStorageException
 
SecureStorageException.ExceptionType - Enum in de.adorsys.android.securestoragelibrary
Used for throwing exceptions with a type that makes more sense to the developer based on the cause
setValue(Context, String, String) - Static method in class de.adorsys.android.securestoragelibrary.SecurePreferences
Takes plain string value, encrypts it and stores it encrypted in the SecureStorage on the Android Device
